price: 144 il serait certainement resté dans le ventre du poisson jusqu’au Jour où les hommes seront ressuscités.
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
